text: Un caso di coscienza (Italian for A matter of conscience) is a 1970 Italian comedy-drama film written and directed by Giovanni Grimaldi. It is based on the Leonardo Sciascia's short story with the same name, which is part of the collection Il mare colore del vino. == Cast == *Lando Buzzanca: Lawyer Salvatore Vaccagnino *Françoise Prévost: Sandra *Raymond Pellegrin: Solfi *Turi Ferro: Judge *Saro Urzì: Pharmacist *Antonella Lualdi: Rita Vaccagnino *Nando Gazzolo: Alfredo Serpieri *Dagmar Lassander: Annalisa *Helga Liné: Lola *Paolo Carlini: Don Gualtiero *Michele Abruzzo: Baron Carmelo Favara *Carletto Sposito: Benito Pozzi *Aldo Puglisi: Accountant Licasio *Franco Lantieri: Gaetano *Marcella Michelangeli: Gaetano's wife *Aldo Bufi Landi: Dr. Giulio *Gisèle Pascal: Dr. Giulio's wife *Alfredo Rizzo: Club president *Elio Zamuto: Nunzio ==See also == * List of Italian films of 1970 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian comedy- drama films Category:1970 comedy-drama films Category:Films set in Sicily Category:Adultery in films Category:Films based on works by Leonardo Sciascia Category:Films directed by Giovanni Grimaldi Category:Films scored by Riz Ortolani Category:Films about lawyers Category:1970 comedy films Category:1970 drama films
